tool_description: Analyzes DNS configuration for a domain, checking various record types and identifying potential issues or optimizations.

domain_name.description: Domain name to analyze DNS records

check_propagation.description: Whether to check DNS propagation across multiple servers

error_messages: Invalid domain name: Provide a valid domain name for DNS analysis.
DNS resolution failed: Unable to resolve DNS records for the domain.
Invalid record types: Use valid DNS record type names (A, AAAA, CNAME, MX, TXT, NS, etc.).
DNS server timeout: DNS queries timed out, try again later.
usage: Provide domain_name to analyze DNS configuration. Customize record_types, include_subdomains, and check_propagation for comprehensive analysis.

dns_records.description: List of found DNS records with values

missing_records.description: Recommended DNS records that are missing

propagation_status.description: DNS propagation status across global servers
